Package eu.acclimatize.unison.user

Class CredentialsRequester

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.acclimatize.unison.user.CredentialsRequester
  • public class CredentialsRequester
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that uses the console to request user credentials (user name and password) information. Credentials are requested if none are present when Unison begins operating or when UserConsole is run from the terminal.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CredentialsRequester​(java.io.PrintWriter writer, java.io.BufferedReader reader, org.springframework.security.crypto.bcrypt.BCryptPasswordEncoder encoder, java.security.SecureRandom random)
      Creates and instance of CredentialsRequester.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String randomPassword()
      Generates a random password.
      UserInformation requestUserInformation()
      Asks the user to enter a user name whether they would like to generate a password or enter one.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CredentialsRequester

        public CredentialsRequester​(java.io.PrintWriter writer,
                            java.io.BufferedReader reader,
                            org.springframework.security.crypto.bcrypt.BCryptPasswordEncoder encoder,
                            java.security.SecureRandom random)
        Creates and instance of CredentialsRequester.
        Parameters:
        writer - Used to display information to the user.
        reader - Used to request data from the user.
        encoder - Used to encrypt the password.
        random - Used in generating random passwords.

    • Method Detail

      • requestUserInformation

        public UserInformation requestUserInformation()
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Asks the user to enter a user name whether they would like to generate a password or enter one.
        Returns:
        Contains the information entered by the user (the password is encoded).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is an I/O problem reading or writing data.

      • randomPassword

        public java.lang.String randomPassword()
        Generates a random password.
        Returns:
        The password generated.
